name: Zachary's Favorite Chicken And Dumplings
author: Charlotte Hooper

ingredients.name: Flour, enough to make stiff dough

instructions: Cook stewing hen until done. Save broth. Chop the meat into small pieces. Add juice and water to large saucepan. Bring back to a boil. Then make dumplings and add them to broth mixture. To make dumplings, mix eggs, 1/2 cup broth and salt together. Add flour, beating well after each addition. When dough is stiff, roll out and slice, dropping in boiling broth. Cook for 5 minutes, stirring after each dumpling is added. Add meat and stir well. Put lid on pot and let stand for 10 minutes. Salt and pepper to taste.
